My Workflow

When starting a project I follow a pratical formula to get the results I am looking for.

1

Brainstorming

I begin by determining the key features needed for the project. Each of these main features can be broken down peice by peice to create a complete wireframe.

2

Mobile First

A growing amount of people opt for smartphones rather than a desktop making it more important than ever to have easy to use mobile interfaces.

3

Clean Code

Nothing hurts the eyes quite like messy code. I make readability a priority when working in the development process.

4

Feedback

Every project I develop goes through vigorious user testing and feedback. My designs must recieve a good UX rating before I begin deployment.
